name: The Mind of Desert
description:
The Mind of Desert is a local coop multiplayer game, where the two players use the same controller to control two characters: Petra, a tough looking but very sweet golent, and Demi, a water being that was lost in the desert running from other creatures. The goal is to help Demi reach a safe location, by overcoming obstacles and solving puzzles.

---------------------------------INFO---------------------------------

YEAR

2023

GENRE

Puzzle, CO-OP, Platformer

PLATFORM

PC

DEVELOPMENT TIME

2-3 MONTHS

The Mind of Desert is an university project on which I worked as a Lead Programmer and VFX/Lighting artist. The game was developed by 2 other people alongside me, Cláudia Reis as Gameplay Programmer, Susana Lima as the Art Director and 3D/UI artist.
